citeinfo.origin: Dakota County GIS, Dakota County GIS, Staff
citeinfo.title: Emergency Location Markers, Dakota and Ramsey County, Minnesota

pubinfo.pubplace: 14955 Galaxie Ave, Apple Valley, Minnesota, 55124, US

descript.abstract: On going inventory of the Emergency Location Markers (ELM) in Dakota County and Ramsey County. These are signs in place, maintained by Dakota County, Ramsey County and their cities.
descript.purpose: On going inventory of the Emergency Location Markers (ELM) in Dakota County and Ramsey County. These are signs in place, maintained by Dakota County, Ramsey County and their cities. Many features have a photo of the sign as an attachment.

theme.themekey: health, USNG, US National Grid, Emergency Preparedness, Signs, ELM, Emergency Location Marker

place.placekey: Dakota County Minnesota, Whitetail Woods Regional Park, Lebanon Hills Regional Park, Ramsey County, Lilydale Park

idinfo.useconst: Dakota County GIS Database Disclaimer NOTICE: Dakota County Geographic Information System (GIS) Data are made available pursuant to the Minnesota Government Data Practices Act (Minnesota Statutes Chapter 13) THE GIS DATA ARE PROVIDED TO YOU AS IS AND WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY AS TO THEIR PERFORMANCE, MERCHANTABILITY, OR FITNESS FOR ANY PARTICULAR PURPOSE. The GIS Data were developed by Dakota County ("County") for their own internal business purposes. The County does not represent or warrant that the GIS Data or the data documentation are error-free, complete, current, or accurate. You are responsible for any consequences resulting from your use of the GIS Data or your reliance on the GIS Data. You should consult the data documentation for this particular GIS Data to determine the limitations of the GIS Data and the precision with which the GIS Data may depict distance, direction, location, or other geographic features. If you transmit or provide the GIS Data (or any portion of it) to another user, you must provide a copy of this disclaimer and the accompanying metadata for this dataset to the user.
idinfo.native: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.3.1.4959

procstep.procdesc: Points created from actual locations of the ELM signs.

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: Facility within which the sign is located.
A link to a photo if not attached to the database.
X coordinate of the sign in UTM Zone 15 N.
Y coordinate of the sign in UTM Zone 15 N.
Grid Zone Designator of the location of the sign. These characters are printed on the actual sign.
Grid Zone of the location of the sign. These characters are printed on the actual sign.
10K coordinate pair of the location of the sign.
The four digit X location for the sign location. These digits are printed on the actual sign.
The four digit Y location for the sign location. These digits are printed on the actual sign.

distinfo.distliab: See access and use constraints information.
